articles.author: Emily Schultheis
articles.title: America’s largest Iranian diaspora is at a crossroads - Politico
articles.description: “This is the time for the California politicians to speak up,” said Sudi Farokhnia, the Los Angeles-based president of the IADC.
articles.content: This is the time for the California politicians to speak up, said Sudi Farokhnia, the Los Angeles-based president of the IADC. And not just speak up, but speak up fast and be very precise in making s… [+3578 chars]
